title: Joliet, IL
content: This is my hometown! I currently live here and have lived here for the last 20 years!

title: Madrid, Spain
content: Madrid Spain is where my favorite soccer team in the world lives. It is my dream Vacation to go here and watch them!

title: Manchester, England
content: My second favorite soccer team in the world. They play in the best league so I would love to watch them play a game live as well!

title: Edinburgh, Scotland
content: I would love to visit this magical looking city! The architecture is a true thing of beauty!

title: Tokyo, Japan
content: One of my dream vacations! I am a big anime fan and would love to visit japan and experience the culture!

title: Jalisco, Mexico
content: Where I was born! Lived here for two years and then moved to the United States. Where my family is from!

title: Denver, Colorado
content: My first ever vacation! Beatiful state with beautiful mountians!

title: Bali, Indonesia
content: Who doesnt want to visit Bali right?

title: Grindavik, Iceland
content: It has always been one of my life goals to visit the blue laggons in Iceland!

title: Joliet, IL
content: This is my hometown! I currently live here and have lived here for the last 20 years!
